name: tesspathy
description: A Javascript library to convert vector graphics paths into triangles which can be used directly by GL-like APIs.

scripts.build:
npm run build-dev && uglifyjs dist/tesspathy.js -o dist/tesspathy.min.js --source-map dist/tesspathy.min.js.map -p relative -c -m --preamble '/**
 * Tesspathy 0.1.0
 * Copyright (C) 2015 Guangyao Liu / GREE, Inc.
 * Tesspathy is licensed under the MIT license.
 */'
